cards.name: Blackbeard's Barista
cards.bio: Serving the most fearsome espresso on the seven seas.

cards.name: Cappuccino Cabin Boy
cards.bio: Whipping up frothy delights, this young brewer can handle the heat of the battle.

cards.name: Scurvy Latte Swashbuckler
cards.bio: With a latte in one hand and a cutlass in the other, this pirate is ready to fight scurvy and enemies alike.

cards.name: Espresso Shot Sharpshooter
cards.bio: Quick on the draw and even quicker with a coffee shot, this pirate never misses.

cards.name: Mocha Matey
cards.bio: A loyal companion with a knack for chocolatey concoctions, this matey keeps the crew's spirits high.

cards.name: Brewmaster Buccaneer
cards.bio: Master of the bean and the blade, this buccaneer brews a mean coffee.

cards.name: Frapp√© Freebooter
cards.bio: Blending up icy storms, this freebooter chills the bones of their enemies.

cards.name: Rum Roast Raider
cards.bio: Infusing their roasts with a hint of rum, this raider brings a buzz to every battle.

cards.name: Steam Wand Swabbie
cards.bio: This swabbie steams milk to perfection, scalding foes who dare to cross the crew.

cards.name: Treasure Chest Tea Brewer
cards.bio: Guarding the crew's tea like buried treasure, this brewer knows the true value of a good cuppa.

cards.name: Captain Caffeine
cards.bio: The legendary boss of the Pirate Baristas, feared for his overwhelming power and the strongest coffee on the ocean.
